    US Regional COVID-19 Positive Cases Data Set

    Source: R/data.R
    us_regional_cases.Rd

    Contains rolling 7-day average COVID-19 cases for US regional areas from April 1st, 2020 to February 13th, 2021.

    Usage

    us_regional_cases

    Format

    An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 1276 rows and 3 columns.

    Details

    Data collected by the Delphi Research Group.

    Examples

    head(us_regional_cases)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 3
#>   date       region    reg_sev_day_cases
#>   <date>     <chr>                 <dbl>
#> 1 2020-04-01 midwest               2884.
#> 2 2020-04-01 northeast            13252.
#> 3 2020-04-01 south                 3797.
#> 4 2020-04-01 west                  2258.
#> 5 2020-04-02 midwest               3128.
#> 6 2020-04-02 northeast            14121.
